Name: minimize_project_duration
Description: Minimize the total duration of all projects

Name: maximize_team_utilization
Description: Maximize the average utilization of all teams

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the total severity of all active blockers

Name: maximize_feature_completion
Description: Maximize the number of features marked as 'Done'

Name: minimize_sprint_overhead
Description: Minimize the total time spent in meetings per sprint

Name: maximize_velocity_consistency
Description: Maximize the consistency (minimize deviation) of team velocity

Name: minimize_context_switch
Description: Minimize the number of different tasks a worker is assigned to

Name: maximize_skill_match
Description: Maximize the alignment between task requirements and worker skills

Name: minimize_budget_overrun
Description: Minimize the total financial overrun across all projects

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the average influence level of satisfied stakeholders
